Chinese Definition:
①一種金屬元素，質堅硬，不受酸的侵蝕，可用於制催化劑。

銠字的基本解释

銠
lǎo
见“铑”。

銠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lǎo］
“铑1”的繁体字。
(1)见“銠”。
(2)金属元素。符号Rh。银白色或带灰蓝色，有光泽，质地坚硬。常镀在探照灯等的反射镜上。它的合金可以制化学仪器和测量高温的仪器。

銠字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　銠； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1305第17
【字彙補】音未詳。王審知鑄大鐵錢，俗謂之銠?。

rhodium
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lǎo］
Traditional characters for "Rhodium 1".
(1) See "Rhodium".
(2) Metal elements. Symbol Rh. Silvery white or grayish blue, shiny, hard texture. Often plated on reflectors such as searchlights. Its alloy can make chemical instruments and instruments for measuring high temperatures.
rhodium
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　 Rhodium; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: Page 1305 Page 17
[Vocabulary complement] The sound is not specified. Wang Shenzhi casts big iron coins, commonly known as rhodium.
